float  seconds,
double  offset,
float  decelerationRatio = 0.9f,
bool  keepMargin = true 
)
static

Adds a slide effect (from left) to the Storyboard.

Parameters
storyboardThe storyboard to add the animation to.
secondsHow long the slide effect lasts
offsetThe distance to the right to start from
decelerationRatioThe rate of deceleration.
keepMarginWether to keep the element at the same width during animation
